attributes.action: remove anomalies in the new system of air passenger duty by introducing a fairer system of distance bands.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The present structure means that travellers to the Caribbean or Kenya will pay more tax than those going to any part of the United States, including Hawaii, which is nearly twice as far from London. 
We believe this will put off travellers from visiting developing economies that rely on tourism for their livelihoods. 
We urge the Prime Minister and Chancellor to change the system in the next finance bill so that poor countries are not unfairly penalised.
We also call for the removal of other anomalies that unfairly tax premium economy passengers and force passengers from the UK regions transiting through Heathrow to pay twice.

government_responses.details:
